title: WTB/WTTF: T211 Red Sun (from REA and others)
author: brass_rat

posts.post_title: WTB/WTTF: T211 Red Sun (from REA and others)
posts.post_content:
Hi all,

I'm hoping that there were some T210 collectors going after the T211/T210 mixed lots in REA last night.  (I do realize that Justin is looking for some of these in another thread -- the REA examples that he and I both need would be upgrades for me, so I would have dupes available that he's cool with.)

T211s I'm looking for from REA last night:
Lot 257: Hickman
Lot 260: Bay, Seitz
Lot 261: Bernhard
Lot 262: Foster

===============

T211s that I have available for trade are: DeMontreville (SGC 40), Fritz (SGC 35).  (And I have a bunch of other cards from different sets, let me know what you are looking for.  Also always willing to buy outright.)

===============

Other T211s I'm looking for:
Bartley (upgrade needed from SGC A)
Cohen (upgrade needed from SGC 10)
E. DeMontreville
Fisher (upgrade needed from trimmed card in SGC 40)
Gribbin (upgrade needed from SGC 10)
Hanks (upgrade needed from SGC A)
Hess (upgrade needed from SGC 20)
Kane
Manush (upgrade needed from SGC A)
Seabourgh (upgrade needed from SGC A)
Smith (upgrade needed from SGC A)
Thomas
Walker (upgrade needed from SGC A)

Thank you for any help,
Steve
